short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recruit heroes, raise pets, repel invading bosses, search for treasure chests, and earn generous rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recruit heroes and pets, enhance their abilities through cultivation, and earn more energy crystals.Use energy crystals to charge the artifacts, repel invading bosses, and receive a large amount of honor points as rewards.With honor points, you can exchange for TMAK tokens, and of course, you can also participate in the lucky wheel to win lucky grand prizes!
